column1: Little Goat Diner////I had the This Little Piggy Went to China as well as the Bull's Eye French Toast. The first dish was very tasty. The smoked blueberries were cool
column2: but I wasn't sure how they complemented the overall dish. It didn't seem to jive that well with chili oil
column4: and sausage. The french toast was sweet and smoky from the barbecue flavor in the maple syrup. The chicken and strawberry with barebecue I found to be an unusual combination. It definitely challenged my palate.
